entry.title: WIND WARNING , Esquimalt
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:03 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Esquimalt Harbour 6:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
Temperature: 8.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 6.0°C
Wind: SW 33 km/h gust 49 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 8. POP 70%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 70 percent chance of showers. Wind southwest 20 km/h except west 50 gusting to 70 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 9.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Wind southwest 30 km/h except gusting to 50 near Juan de Fuca Strait. Temperature steady near 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 100 near Juan de Fuca Strait late in the evening and overnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023
